foreignData.name: Belebung der Toten
foreignData.text: Nimm eine Kreatur aus einem der Friedhöfe und bringe sie sofort auf Deiner Seite mit -1/-0 ins Spiel. Behandle diese Kreatur, als wäre sie gerade erst beschworen worden. Wenn die Verzauberung entfernt wird, begrabe sie auf dem Friedhof ihres Eigentümers.

mainBoard.name: Animate Dead
mainBoard.originalText: Any creature in any graveyard comes into play on your side with -1 to its original power. At end of game, or if this enchantment is discarded without removing target creature from play, target creature is returned to its owner's graveyard. Target creature may be killed as normal.

rulings.text: Abilities such as shroud and protection function only on the battlefield unless otherwise specified. A creature card with shroud may be targeted by Animate Dead, and Animate Dead will become attached to the creature that enters the battlefield.

Animate Dead is an Aura, albeit with an unusual enchant ability. You target a creature card in a graveyard when you cast it. It enters the battlefield attached to that card. Then it returns that card to the battlefield, and attaches itself to the card again (since the card is a new object on the battlefield). Animate Dead itself never moves into a graveyard during this process.
If Animate Dead isn't on the battlefield as its triggered ability resolves, none of its effects happen. The creature card won't be returned to the battlefield.

If the creature put onto the battlefield has protection from black—or if the creature can't legally be enchanted by Animate Dead for another reason—Animate Dead won't be able to attach to it. It will be put into the graveyard as a state-based action, causing its delayed triggered ability to trigger. When the trigger resolves, if the creature's still on the battlefield, its controller will sacrifice it.

Once the creature is returned to the battlefield, Animate Dead can't be attached to anything other than it (unless Animate Dead somehow manages to put a different creature onto the battlefield). Attempting to move Animate Dead to another creature won't work.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When this Aura enters, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with this Aura." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach this Aura to it. When this Aura leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

mainBoard.name: Bad Moon
mainBoard.originalText: All black creatures in play gain +1/+1.

mainBoard.flavorText: 'Twas in the bogs of Cannelbrae My mate did meet an early grave 'Twas nothing left for us to save In the peat-filled bogs of Cannelbrae.
mainBoard.name: Bog Wraith
mainBoard.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "Then flashed the living lightning from her eyes,/ And screams of horror rend th' affrighted skies." —Alexander Pope, *The Rape of the Lock*
mainBoard.name: Cosmic Horror
mainBoard.originalText:
First strike
Pay {3}{B}{B}{B} during your upkeep or Cosmic Horror does 7 damage to you and is destroyed.

rulings.text: If you choose not to pay Cosmic Horror’s upkeep cost, it deals 7 damage to you only if it’s actually destroyed. If it regenerates or an effect has given it indestructible, it deals no damage.

mainBoard.text:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}. If this creature is destroyed this way, it deals 7 damage to you.

foreignData.name: Dunkler Sog
foreignData.text: Für jedes {B} das Du zusätzlich zu den Beschwörungskosten ausgibst, fügt der Dunkle Sog seinem Ziel -das kann sowohl Spieler als auch Kreatur seineinen Schadenspunkt zu. Sodann bekommst Du für jeden so angerichteten Schadenspunkt 1 Lebenspunkt dazu. Du kannst allerdings nicht mehr Lebenspunkte gewinnen als die Kreatur Widerstandskraft bzw. der Spieler Lebenspunkte besitzt.

mainBoard.name: Drain Life
mainBoard.originalText: Drain Life does 1 damage to a single target for each {B} spent in addition to the casting cost. Caster gains 1 life for each damage inflicted. If you drain life from a creature, you cannot gain more life than the creature's current toughness.

rulings.text: Cost reducers can be used to reduce the X part of the mana cost.
You may gain up to the total toughness of the creature even if it was already damaged.

mainBoard.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

foreignData.name: Gegenwart des Bösen
foreignData.text: Das verzauberte Land wird zu einem Standard-Sumpf.

mainBoard.name: Evil Presence
mainBoard.originalText: Target land is now a basic swamp.

rulings.text: The enchanted land loses its existing land types and any abilities printed on it. It now has the land type Swamp and has the ability “{T}: Add {B}.” Evil Presence doesn’t change the enchanted land’s name or whether it’s legendary, basic, or snow.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.

mainBoard.flavorText: She walks in the twilight, her steps make no sound,/ Her feet leave no tracks on the dew-covered ground./ Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name—/ But those who go with her are never the same.
mainBoard.name: Lost Soul
mainBoard.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

mainBoard.name: Necropolis of Azar
mainBoard.text:
Whenever a non-black creature is put into any graveyard from play, put a husk counter on Necropolis of Azar.
{5}, Remove a husk counter from Necropolis of Azar: Put a Spawn of Azar token into play. Treat this token as a black creature with a random power and toughness, each no less than 1 and no greater than 3, that has swampwalk.

foreignData.name: Auferstehung der Toten
foreignData.text: Nimm eine Kreaturenkarte Deiner Wahl aus Deinem Friedhof auf Deine Hand.

mainBoard.name: Raise Dead
mainBoard.originalText: Bring one creature from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.
You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.

mainBoard.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: "They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,/ Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;/ It had been strange, even in a dream,/ To have seen those dead men rise."/ —Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

mainBoard.flavorText: The Wall of Bone is said to be an aspect of the Great Wall in Hel, where the bones of all sinners wait for Ragnarok, when Hela will call them forth for the final battle.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Bone
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Regenerate this creature. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

mainBoard.flavorText: They say the Zombie Master controlled these foul creatures even before his own death, but now that he is one of them, nothing can make them betray him.

foreignData.name: Zombiemeister
foreignData.text: Alle Zombies erhalten die Fähigkeit Sumpftarnung und "{B}: Regeneration"

mainBoard.name: Zombie Master
mainBoard.originalText: All zombies in play gain swampwalk and "{B} Regenerates" for as long as this card remains in play.
mainBoard.text:
Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

foreignData.name: Lähmung
foreignData.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht während der Entap-Phase normal enttappt werden. Der Beherrscher der Kreatur muß in der Versorgungsphase 4 bezahlen, um sie zu enttappen. Tappe die Kreatur, wenn die Lähmung auf sie gesprochen wird.

sideBoard.name: Paralyze
sideBoard.originalText: Target creature is not untapped as normal during untap phase. Creature's controller may spend {4} during his or her upkeep to untap it. Tap target creature when Paralyze is cast.

rulings.text: Paralyze can be cast targeting a creature which is already tapped.
The creature can only be untapped using Paralyze once per turn.
Two Paralyzes are not cumulative. Paying either one will untap the creature.
This is a change from the most recent wording. As was the case in the past, Paralyze itself has the last triggered ability, rather than granting that ability to the enchanted creature.

sideBoard.text:
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If the player does, untap the creature.

foreignData.name: Knochenthron
foreignData.text: {1}: Jeder erfolgreich gesprochene schwarze Zauberspruch gibt Dir 1 Lebenspunkt. Du kannst diese Eigenschaft sofort oder später während des Zuges anwenden, aber nur einmal pro schwarzem Zauberspruch.

sideBoard.name: Throne of Bone
sideBoard.originalText: {1}: Any black spell cast gives you 1 life. Can only give 1 life each time a black spell is cast.
sideBoard.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
